review: I thought this sounded like a great idea.  I often connect my laptop to the TV to watch my Netflix movies, Amazon streaming, etc.; however, I thought this would be much nicer because I would have a remote and access to additional services (i.e. games).  The problem is that the one game I was excited about - You Don't Know Jack - just doesn't work.  So apparently for the games you need to download an app onto your smart phone.  In this case, an app called JackPad.  Downloaded onto several different phones and not one of them will connect to the device despite going through all of the troubleshooting options.  So that is the big disappointment.
